snippet.title: War of Velana Official Trailer
snippet.description:
War of Velana is a 16-bit Tactical JRPG heavily inspired by retro classics like Shining Force and Fire Emblem. In War of Velana, you'll meet and recruit a diverse cast of characters with a variety of skills and equipment as you progress through the game. Between fierce grid-based battles, you’ll be able to explore and interact with the world around you. 

Please wishlist the game on Steam and try our free demo! The demo covers all of Chapter 1 and is around 3 hours of gameplay.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1288720/War_of_Velana/

Also please join our discord! https://discord.gg/nuwbutKBuQ
